analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DataWalletCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#432-471):
	External calls:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#451-452)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#451-452)
	- beneficiary.transfer(weiToReturn) (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#454-456)

	- contribution (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#464-466)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/4/0x201dcb47a936db8d0c6358783a7d24b37d5fd1cd.sol#463-464)
